DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the efficacy, safety and tolerability of BYM338 in patients with sporadic Inclusion Body Myositis
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of BYM338 in Patients With Sporadic Inclusion Body Myositis
DOC.criteria: Males and Females aged 4080 with a confirmed diagnosis of sporadic Inclusion Body Myositis Unable to walk at least 3 meters without assistance from another person Use of oral beta agonists, oral corticosteroids, androgens or androgen inhibitors, or intravenous gamma globulin in the last 6 months patients with a history or presence of renal impairment and/or liver disease Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
